Name: Hero's Journey
About the game: You play as an unnamed Hero who's fighting to save the world from the evil that lies within it. Collect the coins, open the chests and save the world! Travel on a dangerous adventure as you battle goblins and potato men. 7 Maps Fight with a gun or a melee weapon] Coins, chests and running!
